item.title: Telerik WPF RadGridView
item.description: RowDoubleClick # It’s a common request to be able to handle a double-click on a row in a RadGridView. The solution proposed by Telerik (http://demos.telerik.com/silverlight/#GridView/ClickEvents ) is based around code behind: this.grid.AddHandler(GridViewCellBase.CellDoubleClickEvent, new EventHandler<RadRoutedEventArgs>(OnCellDoubleClick), true); if you’re using MVVM, you would probably prefer to attach an ICommand, which will be passed the DataContext of the row that has been clicked on, as a parameter.
